<li id="cite_note-219"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><a href="#cite_ref-219">↑</a></span> <span class="reference-text"><span class="citation"><i>Корняков В. <li id="cite_note-220"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><a href="#cite_ref-220">↑</a></span> <span class="reference-text"><span class="citation"><i>Janet G. <li id="cite_note-243"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><a href="#cite_ref-243">↑</a></span> <span class="reference-text"><span class="citation"><span lang="und"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://marxist.su/lib/Solovyov.pdf">Соловьёв А.&#160;В.&#160;Общественный строй России&#160;— вчера, сегодня, завтра. <li id="cite_note-261"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><a href="#cite_ref-261">↑</a></span> <span class="reference-text"><span class="citation"><span lang="und"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2022-10-10/stalin-had-quality-of-greatness-and-personal-charm-said-british-diplomat">Stalin Had ‘Quality of Greatness’ and Personal Charm, Said British Diplomat</a></span><span class="hidden-ref" style="display:none;">&#160;&#160;<small class="ref-info" style="cursor:help;" title="на неопределённом языке">(неопр.)</small></span>.&#32;<i>www.bloomberg.com</i>&#32;(11 октября 2022).&#32;Дата обращения: 12 октября 2022.</span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-262"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><a href="#cite_ref-262">↑</a></span> <span class="reference-text">Encyclopædia Britannica: a new survey of universal knowledge.&#160;— <a href="/wiki/%D0%9B%D0%BE%D0%BD%D0%B4%D0%BE%D0%BD" title="Лондон">London</a>, 1956.&#160;— V. 21.&#160;— p.303<br /><i>The year 1945 marked the climax in Stalin’s crowded and chequered career. As generalissimo and uncontested leader he was surrounded by an adulation and a cult which assumed its most grotesque forms toward the end of his life. Soviet scientists, writers, musicians, linguists, philosophers and others were made to accept his judgment as final. Underlying the bizarre cult were Stalin’s indubitable achievements. He was the originator of planned economy; he found Russia ivorking with wooden plows and left it equipped with atomic piles; and he was «father of victory.»</i></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-263"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><a href="#cite_ref-263">↑</a></span> <span class="reference-text"><span class="citation no-wikidata" data-wikidata-property-id="P1343"><i>М. М. <li id="cite_note-265"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><a href="#cite_ref-265">↑</a></span> <span class="reference-text"><span class="citation"><i>Черемисинов Г. <li id="cite_note-266"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><a href="#cite_ref-266">↑</a></span> <span class="reference-text"><span class="citation no-wikidata" data-wikidata-property-id="P1343"><i>Лев Лопуховский, Борис Кавалерчик.</i>&#32;<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://books.google.ru/books?id=s25M7qTwco8C&amp;pg=PT32&amp;dq=%D0%B2%D0%BE%D0%B5%D0%BD%D0%BD%D0%B0%D1%8F+%D1%82%D1%80%D0%B5%D0%B2%D0%BE%D0%B3%D0%B0+1927&amp;hl=ru&amp;sa=X&amp;ved=0ahUKEwj41pKbnbjmAhVG_SoKHWs_AjsQ6AEINTAB#v=onepage&amp;q=военная%20тревога%201927&amp;f=false">Июнь 1941. <li id="cite_note-267"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><a href="#cite_ref-267">↑</a></span> <span class="reference-text"><span class="citation"><i>Кондрашин М. <li id="cite_note-Alpatov-286"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><a href="#cite_ref-Alpatov_286-0">↑</a></span> <span class="reference-text"><i><a href="/wiki/%D0%90%D0%BB%D0%BF%D0%B0%D1%82%D0%BE%D0%B2,_%D0%92%D0%BB%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%B8%D0%BC%D0%B8%D1%80_%D0%9C%D0%B8%D1%85%D0%B0%D0%B9%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B8%D1%87" title="Алпатов, Владимир Михайлович">Алпатов&#160;В.&#160;М.</a></i> История одного мифа. Марр и марризм.&#160;— М.: <a href="/wiki/%D0%9D%D0%B0%D1%83%D0%BA%D0%B0_(%D0%B8%D0%B7%D0%B4%D0%B0%D1%82%D0%B5%D0%BB%D1%8C%D1%81%D1%82%D0%B2%D0%BE)" title="Наука (издательство)">Наука</a>, 1991.&#160;— <a href="/wiki/%D0%A1%D0%BB%D1%83%D0%B6%D0%B5%D0%B1%D0%BD%D0%B0%D1%8F:%D0%98%D1%81%D1%82%D0%BE%D1%87%D0%BD%D0%B8%D0%BA%D0%B8_%D0%BA%D0%BD%D0%B8%D0%B3/5020171174" class="internal mw-magiclink-isbn">ISBN 5-02-017117-4</a></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-287"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><a href="#cite_ref-287">↑</a></span> <span class="reference-text"><span class="citation no-wikidata" data-wikidata-property-id="P1343"><i>David Salsburg.</i>&#32;<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://books.google.com/books?id=ej9xytYdkyAC&amp;pg=PA147&amp;dq=lady+with+tea+soviet+statistics&amp;as_brr=3&amp;ei=6FwMR7-yPIP06wLAy6DUCQ&amp;sig=lFxEvOOxaGPB-mRsiVuhbJoENO8#PPA148,M1">The Lady Tasting Tea: How Statistics Revolutionized Science in the Twentieth Century</a>.&#160;— Macmillan, 2002-05.&#160;— 356&#160;с.&#160;— <a href="/wiki/%D0%A1%D0%BB%D1%83%D0%B6%D0%B5%D0%B1%D0%BD%D0%B0%D1%8F:%D0%98%D1%81%D1%82%D0%BE%D1%87%D0%BD%D0%B8%D0%BA%D0%B8_%D0%BA%D0%BD%D0%B8%D0%B3/9780805071344" class="internal mw-magiclink-isbn">ISBN 978-0-8050-7134-4</a>.</span></span>

<li id="cite_note-302"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><a href="#cite_ref-302">↑</a></span> <span class="reference-text"><span class="citation"><i><a href="/wiki/%D0%90%D0%BD%D0%B4%D0%B5%D1%80%D1%81,_%D0%92%D0%BB%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%B8%D1%81%D0%BB%D0%B0%D0%B2" title="Андерс, Владислав">Андерс В.</a></i>&#32;<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.sakharov-center.ru/asfcd/auth/?t=page&amp;num=1345">Без последней главы</a>&#160;// <i>Пер. с польск. <li id="cite_note-303"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><a href="#cite_ref-303">↑</a></span> <span class="reference-text"><span class="citation"><span lang="und"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.magister.msk.ru/library/stalin/13-21.htm">«Правда», №&#160;329, 30 ноября 1936&#160;г.</a></span><span class="hidden-ref" style="display:none;">&#160;&#160;<small class="ref-info" style="cursor:help;" title="на неопределённом языке">(неопр.)</small></span>&#32;Дата обращения: 20 мая 2009.&#32;<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20071105005816/http://www.magister.msk.ru/library/stalin/13-21.htm">Архивировано</a> 5 ноября 2007 года.</span></span>

<li id="cite_note-autogenerated12-324"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">↑ <a href="#cite_ref-autogenerated12_324-0"><sup><i><b>1</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-autogenerated12_324-1"><sup><i><b>2</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.echo.msk.ru/programs/staliname/582884-echo/">Профессор истории Института современной истории при</a> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20131109235403/http://www.echo.msk.ru/programs/staliname/582884-echo/">Архивная копия</a> от 9 ноября 2013 на <a href="/wiki/Wayback_Machine" title="Wayback Machine">Wayback Machine</a> <a href="/wiki/%D0%9D%D0%B0%D1%86%D0%B8%D0%BE%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%BB%D1%8C%D0%BD%D1%8B%D0%B9_%D1%86%D0%B5%D0%BD%D1%82%D1%80_%D0%BD%D0%B0%D1%83%D1%87%D0%BD%D1%8B%D1%85_%D0%B8%D1%81%D1%81%D0%BB%D0%B5%D0%B4%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%B8%D0%B9" title="Национальный центр научных исследований">Национальном центре научных исследований</a> <a href="/wiki/%D0%92%D0%B5%D1%80%D1%82,_%D0%9D%D0%B8%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%BB%D1%8F" title="Верт, Николя">Николя Верт</a> в эфире программы «Именем Сталина»</span>

<li id="cite_note-353"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><a href="#cite_ref-353">↑</a></span> <span class="reference-text"><span class="citation"><span lang="und"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://potok.ua/novost-dnya/56183-stalin-zhiv.html">Сталин жив?&#160;» ИИИ "Поток" | Главные новости дня</a></span><span class="hidden-ref" style="display:none;">&#160;&#160;<small class="ref-info" style="cursor:help;" title="на неопределённом языке">(неопр.)</small></span>.&#32;potok.ua.&#32;Дата обращения: 25 ноября 2019.&#32;<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20191117054607/http://potok.ua/novost-dnya/56183-stalin-zhiv.html">Архивировано</a> 17 ноября 2019 года.</span></span>

<li id="cite_note-354"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><a href="#cite_ref-354">↑</a></span> <span class="reference-text"><span class="citation"><span lang="ru"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.vedomosti.ru/politics/articles/2015/01/21/za-stalina-carya-i-otechestvo">Россияне положительно оценивают и Сталина, и Николая II - «Левада-центр»</a></span><span class="hidden-ref" style="display:none;">&#160;&#160;<span class="ref-info" style="cursor:help;" title="на русском языке">(рус.)</span></span>.&#32;Ведомости.&#32;Дата обращения: 25 ноября 2019.&#32;<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20190401182200/https://www.vedomosti.ru/politics/articles/2015/01/21/za-stalina-carya-i-otechestvo">Архивировано</a> 1 апреля 2019 года.</span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-355"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><a href="#cite_ref-355">↑</a></span> <span class="reference-text"><span class="citation"><i>Курбов И.</i>&#32;<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.gazeta.ru/culture/2019/12/21/a_12877538.shtml">От любви до ненависти: как менялся образ Сталина в кино</a>&#160;// <a href="/wiki/%D0%93%D0%B0%D0%B7%D0%B5%D1%82%D0%B0.ru" title="Газета.ru">Газета.ru</a>.&#160;— 2019.&#160;— 21 декабря.&#32;<small><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20230905175901/https://www.gazeta.ru/culture/2019/12/21/a_12877538.shtml">Архивировано</a> 5&#160;сентября 2023&#160;года.</small></span></span>
</li>
</ol></div></div>
<h2><span id=".D0.9B.D0.B8.D1.82.D0.B5.D1.80.D0.B0.D1.82.D1.83.D1.80.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Литература">Литература</span></h2>
<dl><dt>на русском языке</dt></dl>

E.</span></a><span class="noprint" style="font-style:normal; font-weight:normal;">&#160;<span style="display:inline-block; font-size:80%; position:relative;"><span style="font-size:117.6%; margin-left:-0.43em; position:relative; top:0.28em;">&#160;<small class="ref-info" style="cursor:help;" title="на английском языке">(англ.)</small></span><span class="link-ru metadata" style="margin-left:-0.43em; position:absolute; left:0; z-index:1; margin-top:-0.35em;"><span style="visibility:hidden; margin-right:0.099em;">&#160;(</span><span data-interwiki-lang="en" data-interwiki-article="Stephen E. Ambrose"><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%90%D0%BC%D0%B1%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B7,_%D0%A1%D1%82%D0%B8%D0%B2%D0%B5%D0%BD&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Амброз, Стивен (страница отсутствует)">рус.</a></span></span></span>.</span></i>&#32;<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://archive.org/details/eisenhowerberlin00ambr">Eisenhower and Berlin, 1945: The Decision to Halt at the Elbe</a>&#160;<small class="ref-info" style="cursor:help;" title="на английском языке">(англ.)</small>&#32;&#47;&#32;Under the Gen. Editorship of <span class="nowrap"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Harold_Hyman" class="extiw" title="en:Harold Hyman"><span title="Harold Hyman — версия статьи «Займам, Гарольд» на английском языке">H. M. Hyman</span></a><span class="noprint" style="font-style:normal; font-weight:normal;">&#160;<span style="display:inline-block; font-size:80%; position:relative;"><span style="font-size:117.6%; margin-left:-0.43em; position:relative; top:0.28em;">&#160;<small class="ref-info" style="cursor:help;" title="на английском языке">(англ.)</small></span><span class="link-ru metadata" style="margin-left:-0.43em; position:absolute; left:0; z-index:1; margin-top:-0.35em;"><span style="visibility:hidden; margin-right:0.099em;">&#160;(</span><span data-interwiki-lang="en" data-interwiki-article="Harold Hyman"><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%97%D0%B0%D0%B9%D0%BC%D0%B0%D0%BC,_%D0%93%D0%B0%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%BB%D1%8C%D0%B4&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Займам, Гарольд (страница отсутствует)">рус.</a></span></span></span></span></span>.&#160;— <abbr title="New York">N.&#160;Y.</abbr>: <a href="/wiki/W._W._Norton_%26_Company" title="W. W. Norton &amp; Company">W. W. Norton &amp; Company</a>, 1967.&#160;— 119&#160;p.</span></li>
<li><span class="citation no-wikidata" data-wikidata-property-id="P1343" id="CITEREFKotkin2014"><i><a href="/wiki/%D0%9A%D0%BE%D1%82%D0%BA%D0%B8%D0%BD,_%D0%A1%D1%82%D0%B8%D0%B2%D0%B5%D0%BD" title="Коткин, Стивен">Kotkin S.</a></i>&#32;Stalin: Paradoxes of Power, 1878—1928.&#160;— London: Allen Lane, 2014.&#160;— <a href="/wiki/%D0%A1%D0%BB%D1%83%D0%B6%D0%B5%D0%B1%D0%BD%D0%B0%D1%8F:%D0%98%D1%81%D1%82%D0%BE%D1%87%D0%BD%D0%B8%D0%BA%D0%B8_%D0%BA%D0%BD%D0%B8%D0%B3/9780713999440" class="internal mw-magiclink-isbn">ISBN 978-0-7139-9944-0</a>.</span></li>
<li><span class="citation no-wikidata" data-wikidata-property-id="P1343" id="CITEREFKotkin2017"><i>Kotkin, Stephen.</i>&#32;Stalin: Waiting for Hitler, 1929—1941.&#160;— London: Allen Lane, 2017.&#160;— <a href="/wiki/%D0%A1%D0%BB%D1%83%D0%B6%D0%B5%D0%B1%D0%BD%D0%B0%D1%8F:%D0%98%D1%81%D1%82%D0%BE%D1%87%D0%BD%D0%B8%D0%BA%D0%B8_%D0%BA%D0%BD%D0%B8%D0%B3/9780713999457" class="internal mw-magiclink-isbn">ISBN 978-0-7139-9945-7</a>.</span></li>
<li><span class="citation no-wikidata" data-wikidata-property-id="P1343" id="CITEREFShearer2006"><i>Shearer D. R.</i>&#32;<span data-wikidata-qualifier-id="P248"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.cultorweb.com/eBooks/Storia/Cambridge%20Hist%20Russia/THE%20CAMBRIDGE%20HISTORY%20OF%20RUSSIA,%20Volume%20III%20-%20The%20Twentieth%20Century.pdf#page=217">Stalinism, 1928—1940&#160;<small class="ref-info" style="cursor:help;" title="на английском языке">(англ.)</small></a></span>&#32;&#47;&#47;&#32;<a href="/wiki/The_Cambridge_History_of_Russia" class="mw-redirect" title="The Cambridge History of Russia">The Cambridge History of Russia</a>: in 3 Vol&#32;&#47;&#32;Ed. by <span class="nowrap"><a href="/wiki/%D0%A1%D1%83%D0%BD%D0%B8,_%D0%A0%D0%BE%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%BB%D1%8C%D0%B4_%D0%93%D1%80%D0%B8%D0%B3%D0%BE%D1%80" title="Суни, Рональд Григор">R. G. Suny</a></span>.&#160;— Cambridge: <a href="/wiki/Cambridge_University_Press" class="mw-redirect" title="Cambridge University Press">Cambridge University Press</a>, 2006.&#160;— Vol.&#160;3<span class="dabhide">:</span> The Twentieth Century.&#160;— P.&#160;192—216.&#160;— <a href="/wiki/%D0%A1%D0%BB%D1%83%D0%B6%D0%B5%D0%B1%D0%BD%D0%B0%D1%8F:%D0%98%D1%81%D1%82%D0%BE%D1%87%D0%BD%D0%B8%D0%BA%D0%B8_%D0%BA%D0%BD%D0%B8%D0%B3/9780521811446" class="internal mw-magiclink-isbn">ISBN 978-0-521-81144-6</a>.</span></li></ul>
</div>
<h2><span id=".D0.A1.D1.81.D1.8B.D0.BB.D0.BA.D0.B8"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Ссылки">Ссылки</span></h2>

</div></td></tr></tbody></table><div></div></td></tr></tbody></table></div>

учредительного собрания от Петроградского столичного избирательного округа"><table class="nowraplinks collapsible collapsed navbox-inner" <div role="navigation" class="navbox" aria-labelledby="Иосиф_Сталин" data-name="Иосиф Сталин"><table class="nowraplinks collapsible collapsed navbox-inner" style="border-spacing:0;background:transparent;color:inherit"><tbody><tr><th scope="colgroup" class="navbox-title" colspan="2" style="text-align: center;"><span class="navbox-gear" style="float:left;text-align:left;width:5em;margin-right:0.5em"><span class="noprint" typeof="mw:File"><a href="/wiki/%D0%A8%D0%B0%D0%B1%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%BD:%D0%98%D0%BE%D1%81%D0%B8%D1%84_%D0%A1%D1%82%D0%B0%D0%BB%D0%B8%D0%BD" title="Перейти к шаблону «Иосиф Сталин»"><img alt="Перейти к шаблону «Иосиф Сталин»" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/c/c9/Wikipedia_interwiki_section_gear_icon.svg/14px-Wikipedia_interwiki_section_gear_icon.svg.png" decoding="async" width="14" height="14" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/c/c9/Wikipedia_interwiki_section_gear_icon.svg/21px-Wikipedia_interwiki_section_gear_icon.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/c/c9/Wikipedia_interwiki_section_gear_icon.svg/28px-Wikipedia_interwiki_section_gear_icon.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="14" data-file-height="14" /></a></span>&#160;</span><div id="Иосиф_Сталин" style="font-size:114%;margin:0 5em"><a class="mw-selflink selflink">Иосиф Сталин</a></div></th></tr><tr><th scope="row" class="navbox-group" style="text-align: center;;width:1px">Происхождение, семья</th><td class="navbox-list navbox-odd hlist" style="text-align:left;border-left-width:2px;border-left-style:solid;width:100%;padding:0px"><div style="padding:0em 0.25em">

<li><a href="/wiki/%D0%A1%D0%B2%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%B8%D0%B4%D0%B7%D0%B5,_%D0%95%D0%BA%D0%B0%D1%82%D0%B5%D1%80%D0%B8%D0%BD%D0%B0_%D0%A1%D0%B5%D0%BC%D1%91%D0%BD%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%BD%D0%B0" title="Сванидзе, Екатерина Семёновна">Первая жена</a></li>

<li><a href="/wiki/%D0%9A%D0%B0%D1%82%D0%B5%D0%B3%D0%BE%D1%80%D0%B8%D1%8F:%D0%A1%D1%82%D0%B0%D0%BB%D0%B8%D0%BD_%D0%B2_%D1%84%D0%B8%D0%BB%D0%B0%D1%82%D0%B5%D0%BB%D0%B8%D0%B8" title="Категория:Сталин в филателии">Сталин в филателии</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/%D0%9F%D0%B0%D0%BC%D1%8F%D1%82%D0%BD%D0%B8%D0%BA%D0%B8_%D0%A1%D1%82%D0%B0%D0%BB%D0%B8%D0%BD%D1%83" title="Памятники Сталину">Памятники Сталину</a></li></ul>
</div></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" class="navbox-group" style="text-align: center;;width:1px">Сталин и общественное<br /> сознание</th><td class="navbox-list navbox-odd hlist" style="text-align:left;border-left-width:2px;border-left-style:solid;width:100%;padding:0px"><div style="padding:0em 0.25em">
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/%D0%94%D0%B5%D1%81%D1%82%D0%B0%D0%BB%D0%B8%D0%BD%D0%B8%D0%B7%D0%B0%D1%86%D0%B8%D1%8F" title="Десталинизация">Десталинизация</a></li>

<li><a href="/wiki/%D0%90%D0%B2%D1%82%D0%BE%D0%B1%D1%83%D1%81_%D0%9F%D0%BE%D0%B1%D0%B5%D0%B4%D1%8B" title="Автобус Победы">Автобус Победы</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/%D0%A1%D1%82%D0%B0%D0%BB%D0%B8%D0%BD%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%B5_%D0%BE%D0%B1%D1%89%D0%B5%D1%81%D1%82%D0%B2%D0%BE_(%D0%92%D0%B5%D0%BB%D0%B8%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%B1%D1%80%D0%B8%D1%82%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%B8%D1%8F)" title="Сталинское общество (Великобритания)">«Сталинское общество» в Великобритании</a></li></ul>

<div role="navigation" class="navbox" aria-labelledby="Генеалогическое_древо_(дерево_предков_и_потомков)" style="padding:3px;">
<table class="collapsible autocollapse navbox-inner" style="border-spacing:0;background:transparent;color:inherit;table-layout: fixed;"><tbody><tr><th scope="col" class="navbox-title" style="background: #cfe3ff;"><span style="float:left;text-align:left;width:5em;margin-right:0.5em"><span typeof="mw:File"><a href="/wiki/%D0%A8%D0%B0%D0%B1%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%BD:Wikidata/FamilyTree" title="Просмотр этого шаблона"><img alt="⛭" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/c/c9/Wikipedia_interwiki_section_gear_icon.svg/14px-Wikipedia_interwiki_section_gear_icon.svg.png" decoding="async" width="14" height="14" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/c/c9/Wikipedia_interwiki_section_gear_icon.svg/21px-Wikipedia_interwiki_section_gear_icon.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/c/c9/Wikipedia_interwiki_section_gear_icon.svg/28px-Wikipedia_interwiki_section_gear_icon.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="14" data-file-height="14" /></a></span></span><div id="Генеалогическое_древо_(дерево_предков_и_потомков)" style="font-size:114%;margin:0 5em">Генеалогическое древо (дерево предков и потомков)</div></th></tr><tr style="display: table-row;"><td class="navbox-list navbox-odd" style="width:100%;padding:0px;overflow: auto;"><div style="padding:0em 0.25em; max-width: 100%; overflow: auto; max-height: 50em;"><div class="NavContent">

<a <p><span class="nowrap"><a href="/wiki/%D0%9B%D0%B5%D0%BD%D0%B8%D0%BD,_%D0%92%D0%BB%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%B8%D0%BC%D0%B8%D1%80_%D0%98%D0%BB%D1%8C%D0%B8%D1%87" title="Ленин, Владимир Ильич">Владимир Ленин</a><sup><b>1</b></sup> <small>(1922—1924)</small> </span>
</p>
</div></div></td><td class="navbox-image" rowspan="6" style="width:1px;padding:0px 0px 0px 7px"><div><span typeof="mw:File"><a href="/wiki/%D0%A4%D0%B0%D0%B9%D0%BB:Flag_of_the_Soviet_Union.svg" class="mw-file-description"><img src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/a/a9/Flag_of_the_Soviet_Union.svg/50px-Flag_of_the_Soviet_Union.svg.png" decoding="async" width="50" height="25" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/a/a9/Flag_of_the_Soviet_Union.svg/75px-Flag_of_the_Soviet_Union.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/a/a9/Flag_of_the_Soviet_Union.svg/100px-Flag_of_the_Soviet_Union.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="1200" data-file-height="600" /></a></span> <br />  <br /> <span typeof="mw:File"><a href="/wiki/%D0%A4%D0%B0%D0%B9%D0%BB:Coat_of_arms_of_the_Soviet_Union_(1956%E2%80%931991).svg" class="mw-file-description"><img src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/d/d9/Coat_of_arms_of_the_Soviet_Union_%281956%E2%80%931991%29.svg/50px-Coat_of_arms_of_the_Soviet_Union_%281956%E2%80%931991%29.svg.png" decoding="async" width="50" height="52" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/d/d9/Coat_of_arms_of_the_Soviet_Union_%281956%E2%80%931991%29.svg/75px-Coat_of_arms_of_the_Soviet_Union_%281956%E2%80%931991%29.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/d/d9/Coat_of_arms_of_the_Soviet_Union_%281956%E2%80%931991%29.svg/100px-Coat_of_arms_of_the_Soviet_Union_%281956%E2%80%931991%29.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="587" data-file-height="605" /></a></span></div></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" class="navbox-group" style="text-align: center;;width:1px">Генеральный секретарь ЦК ВКП(б) (1922—1934)</th><td class="navbox-list navbox-even hlist hlist-items-nowrap" style="text-align:left;border-left-width:2px;border-left-style:solid;width:100%;padding:0px"><div style="padding:0em 0.25em"><div>
<p><span class="nowrap"><a class="mw-selflink selflink">Иосиф Сталин</a> (1922—1934) </span>
</p>
</div></div></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" class="navbox-group" style="text-align: center;;width:1px">Секретари ЦК ВКП(б)/КПСС (1934—1953)</th><td class="navbox-list navbox-odd hlist hlist-items-nowrap" style="text-align:left;border-left-width:2px;border-left-style:solid;width:100%;padding:0px"><div style="padding:0em 0.25em">
<ul><li><a class="mw-selflink selflink">Иосиф Сталин</a><sup><b>1</b></sup> <small>(1934—1953)</small></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/%D0%9C%D0%B0%D0%BB%D0%B5%D0%BD%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%B2,_%D0%93%D0%B5%D0%BE%D1%80%D0%B3%D0%B8%D0%B9_%D0%9C%D0%B0%D0%BA%D1%81%D0%B8%D0%BC%D0%B8%D0%BB%D0%B8%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B8%D1%87" title="Маленков, Георгий Максимилианович">Георгий Маленков</a> (1953)</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/%D0%A5%D1%80%D1%83%D1%89%D1%91%D0%B2,_%D0%9D%D0%B8%D0%BA%D0%B8%D1%82%D0%B0_%D0%A1%D0%B5%D1%80%D0%B3%D0%B5%D0%B5%D0%B2%D0%B8%D1%87" title="Хрущёв, Никита Сергеевич">Никита Хрущёв</a> (1953)</li></ul>
</div></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" class="navbox-group" style="text-align: center;;width:1px">Первые секретари ЦК КПСС (1953—1966)</th><td class="navbox-list navbox-even hlist hlist-items-nowrap" style="text-align:left;border-left-width:2px;border-left-style:solid;width:100%;padding:0px"><div style="padding:0em 0.25em">
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/%D0%A5%D1%80%D1%83%D1%89%D1%91%D0%B2,_%D0%9D%D0%B8%D0%BA%D0%B8%D1%82%D0%B0_%D0%A1%D0%B5%D1%80%D0%B3%D0%B5%D0%B5%D0%B2%D0%B8%D1%87" title="Хрущёв, Никита Сергеевич">Никита Хрущёв</a> (1953—1964)</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/%D0%91%D1%80%D0%B5%D0%B6%D0%BD%D0%B5%D0%B2,_%D0%9B%D0%B5%D0%BE%D0%BD%D0%B8%D0%B4_%D0%98%D0%BB%D1%8C%D0%B8%D1%87" title="Брежнев, Леонид Ильич">Леонид Брежнев</a> (1964—1966)</li></ul>
</div></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" class="navbox-group" style="text-align: center;;width:1px">Генеральные секретари ЦК КПСС (1966—1990)</th><td class="navbox-list navbox-odd hlist hlist-items-nowrap" style="text-align:left;border-left-width:2px;border-left-style:solid;width:100%;padding:0px"><div style="padding:0em 0.25em">
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/%D0%91%D1%80%D0%B5%D0%B6%D0%BD%D0%B5%D0%B2,_%D0%9B%D0%B5%D0%BE%D0%BD%D0%B8%D0%B4_%D0%98%D0%BB%D1%8C%D0%B8%D1%87" title="Брежнев, Леонид Ильич">Леонид Брежнев</a><sup><b>1</b></sup> <small>(1966—1982)</small></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/%D0%90%D0%BD%D0%B4%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%BF%D0%BE%D0%B2,_%D0%AE%D1%80%D0%B8%D0%B9_%D0%92%D0%BB%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%B8%D0%BC%D0%B8%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B8%D1%87" title="Андропов, Юрий Владимирович">Юрий Андропов</a><sup><b>1</b></sup> <small>(1982—1984)</small></li>

<ul><li><a href="/wiki/%D0%A5%D1%80%D1%83%D1%89%D1%91%D0%B2,_%D0%9D%D0%B8%D0%BA%D0%B8%D1%82%D0%B0_%D0%A1%D0%B5%D1%80%D0%B3%D0%B5%D0%B5%D0%B2%D0%B8%D1%87" title="Хрущёв, Никита Сергеевич">Никита Хрущёв</a> <small>(1953—64)</small></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/%D0%91%D1%80%D0%B5%D0%B6%D0%BD%D0%B5%D0%B2,_%D0%9B%D0%B5%D0%BE%D0%BD%D0%B8%D0%B4_%D0%98%D0%BB%D1%8C%D0%B8%D1%87" title="Брежнев, Леонид Ильич">Леонид Брежнев</a> <small>(1964—66)</small></li></ul>
</div></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" class="navbox-group" style="width:1px"><a href="/wiki/%D0%93%D0%B5%D0%BD%D0%B5%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%BB%D1%8C%D0%BD%D1%8B%D0%B9_%D1%81%D0%B5%D0%BA%D1%80%D0%B5%D1%82%D0%B0%D1%80%D1%8C_%D0%A6%D0%9A_%D0%9A%D0%9F%D0%A1%D0%A1" title="Генеральный секретарь ЦК КПСС">Генеральные секретари</a><sup id="cite_ref-360" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-360">&#91;5&#93;</a></sup></th><td class="navbox-list navbox-odd hlist hlist-items-nowrap" style="text-align:left;border-left-width:2px;border-left-style:solid;width:100%;padding:0px"><div style="padding:0em 0.25em">
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/%D0%91%D1%80%D0%B5%D0%B6%D0%BD%D0%B5%D0%B2,_%D0%9B%D0%B5%D0%BE%D0%BD%D0%B8%D0%B4_%D0%98%D0%BB%D1%8C%D0%B8%D1%87" title="Брежнев, Леонид Ильич">Леонид Брежнев</a> <small>(1966—82)</small></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/%D0%90%D0%BD%D0%B4%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%BF%D0%BE%D0%B2,_%D0%AE%D1%80%D0%B8%D0%B9_%D0%92%D0%BB%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%B8%D0%BC%D0%B8%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B8%D1%87" title="Андропов, Юрий Владимирович">Юрий Андропов</a> <small>(1982—84)</small></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/%D0%A7%D0%B5%D1%80%D0%BD%D0%B5%D0%BD%D0%BA%D0%BE,_%D0%9A%D0%BE%D0%BD%D1%81%D1%82%D0%B0%D0%BD%D1%82%D0%B8%D0%BD_%D0%A3%D1%81%D1%82%D0%B8%D0%BD%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B8%D1%87" title="Черненко, Константин Устинович">Константин Черненко</a> <small>(1984—85)</small></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/%D0%93%D0%BE%D1%80%D0%B1%D0%B0%D1%87%D1%91%D0%B2,_%D0%9C%D0%B8%D1%85%D0%B0%D0%B8%D0%BB_%D0%A1%D0%B5%D1%80%D0%B3%D0%B5%D0%B5%D0%B2%D0%B8%D1%87" title="Горбачёв, Михаил Сергеевич">Михаил Горбачёв</a> <small>(1985—91)</small></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/%D0%98%D0%B2%D0%B0%D1%88%D0%BA%D0%BE,_%D0%92%D0%BB%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%B8%D0%BC%D0%B8%D1%80_%D0%90%D0%BD%D1%82%D0%BE%D0%BD%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B8%D1%87" title="Ивашко, Владимир Антонович">Владимир Ивашко</a> <small>(и.о., 1991)</small><sup id="cite_ref-361" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-361">&#91;6&#93;</a></sup></li></ul>
</div></td></tr><tr><td class="navbox-abovebelow" colspan="3" style="font-size:smaller;"><div>Примечания <div class="reflist columns" style="list-style-type: decimal;">
<div class="mw-references-wrap"><ol class="references">
<li id="cite_note-356"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><a href="#cite_ref-356">↑</a></span> <span class="reference-text">Ленин был лидером партии большевиков с момента её создания <a href="/wiki/%D0%A0%D0%BE%D1%81%D1%81%D0%B8%D0%B9%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%B0%D1%8F_%D1%81%D0%BE%D1%86%D0%B8%D0%B0%D0%BB-%D0%B4%D0%B5%D0%BC%D0%BE%D0%BA%D1%80%D0%B0%D1%82%D0%B8%D1%87%D0%B5%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%B0%D1%8F_%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B1%D0%BE%D1%87%D0%B0%D1%8F_%D0%BF%D0%B0%D1%80%D1%82%D0%B8%D1%8F_(%D0%B1%D0%BE%D0%BB%D1%8C%D1%88%D0%B5%D0%B2%D0%B8%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%B2)" title="Российская социал-демократическая рабочая партия (большевиков)">как отдельной партии</a> в 1917. До этого, с 1898 он возглавлял фракцию большевиков в <a href="/wiki/%D0%A0%D0%BE%D1%81%D1%81%D0%B8%D0%B9%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%B0%D1%8F_%D1%81%D0%BE%D1%86%D0%B8%D0%B0%D0%BB-%D0%B4%D0%B5%D0%BC%D0%BE%D0%BA%D1%80%D0%B0%D1%82%D0%B8%D1%87%D0%B5%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%B0%D1%8F_%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B1%D0%BE%D1%87%D0%B0%D1%8F_%D0%BF%D0%B0%D1%80%D1%82%D0%B8%D1%8F" title="Российская социал-демократическая рабочая партия">РСДРП</a>, при этом не занимая формальных руководящих постов.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-357"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><a href="#cite_ref-357">↑</a></span> <span class="reference-text">Должность генерального секретаря ЦК введена в 1922 на <a href="/wiki/XI_%D1%81%D1%8A%D0%B5%D0%B7%D0%B4_%D0%A0%D0%9A%D0%9F(%D0%B1)" title="XI съезд РКП(б)">XI съезде</a>; при этом не была закреплена в уставе, и формально генсек не был руководителем партии. В 1925 на <a href="/wiki/XIV_%D1%81%D1%8A%D0%B5%D0%B7%D0%B4_%D0%92%D0%9A%D0%9F(%D0%B1)" title="XIV съезд ВКП(б)">XIV съезде</a> партия была переименована в ВКП(б). Сталин занимал эту должность с момента её создания, однако полновластным руководителем партии и СССР стал только к началу 30-х гг.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-358"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><a href="#cite_ref-358">↑</a></span> <span class="reference-text">В 1934 году на <a href="/wiki/XVII_%D1%81%D1%8A%D0%B5%D0%B7%D0%B4_%D0%92%D0%9A%D0%9F(%D0%B1)" title="XVII съезд ВКП(б)">XVII съезде</a> должность генсека была упразднена. Формально высшим органом партии стал Секретариат ЦК, все члены которого были равноправны. Фактически лидером партии и государства был один из секретарей Сталин; в марте 1953 его сменил другой секретарь Маленков. В 1952 на <a href="/wiki/XIX_%D1%81%D1%8A%D0%B5%D0%B7%D0%B4_%D0%9A%D0%9F%D0%A1%D0%A1" title="XIX съезд КПСС">XIX съезде</a> партия была переименована в КПСС. Ряд представленных здесь секретарей занимал посты в Секретариате до 1934 и после 1953, однако в этот период они не были формальными лидерами партии</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-359"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><a href="#cite_ref-359">↑</a></span> <span class="reference-text">В 1953 была учреждена должность первого секретаря; в устав было внесено изменение, давшее ей официальный статус высшей в партии.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-360"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><a href="#cite_ref-360">↑</a></span> <span class="reference-text">В 1966 на <a href="/wiki/XXIII_%D1%81%D1%8A%D0%B5%D0%B7%D0%B4_%D0%9A%D0%9F%D0%A1%D0%A1" title="XXIII съезд КПСС">XXIII съезде</a> должность была переименована.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-361"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><a href="#cite_ref-361">↑</a></span> <span class="reference-text">24 августа 1991 Горбачёв сложил с себя полномочия генсека. Его заместитель Ивашко занимал эту должность до запрета КПСС</span>
</li>
</ol></div></div></div></td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div role="navigation" class="navbox" aria-labelledby="Президиум_XIX_съезда_КПСС" data-name="Президиум XIX съезда КПСС"><table class="nowraplinks collapsible collapsed navbox-inner" style="border-spacing:0;background:transparent;color:inherit"><tbody><tr><th scope="colgroup" class="navbox-title" colspan="2"><span class="navbox-gear" style="float:left;text-align:left;width:5em;margin-right:0.5em"><span class="noprint" typeof="mw:File"><a href="/wiki/%D0%A8%D0%B0%D0%B1%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%BD:%D0%9F%D1%80%D0%B5%D0%B7%D0%B8%D0%B4%D0%B8%D1%83%D0%BC_XIX_%D1%81%D1%8A%D0%B5%D0%B7%D0%B4%D0%B0_%D0%9A%D0%9F%D0%A1%D0%A1" title="Перейти к шаблону «Президиум XIX съезда КПСС»"><img alt="Перейти к шаблону «Президиум XIX съезда КПСС»" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/c/c9/Wikipedia_interwiki_section_gear_icon.svg/14px-Wikipedia_interwiki_section_gear_icon.svg.png" decoding="async" width="14" height="14" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/c/c9/Wikipedia_interwiki_section_gear_icon.svg/21px-Wikipedia_interwiki_section_gear_icon.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/c/c9/Wikipedia_interwiki_section_gear_icon.svg/28px-Wikipedia_interwiki_section_gear_icon.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="14" data-file-height="14" /></a></span>&#160;</span><div id="Президиум_XIX_съезда_КПСС" style="font-size:114%;margin:0 5em">Президиум <a href="/wiki/XIX_%D1%81%D1%8A%D0%B5%D0%B7%D0%B4_%D0%9A%D0%9F%D0%A1%D0%A1" title="XIX съезд КПСС">XIX съезда КПСС</a></div></th></tr><tr><td class="navbox-list navbox-odd hlist hlist-items-nowrap" style="width:100%;padding:0px"><div style="padding:0em 0.25em">
<ul><li><a class="mw-selflink selflink">И.&#160;В.&#160;Сталин</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/%D0%9A%D0%B0%D0%B3%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B8%D1%87,_%D0%9B%D0%B0%D0%B7%D0%B0%D1%80%D1%8C_%D0%9C%D0%BE%D0%B8%D1%81%D0%B5%D0%B5%D0%B2%D0%B8%D1%87" title="Каганович, Лазарь Моисеевич">Л.&#160;М.&#160;Каганович</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/%D0%9C%D0%B0%D0%BB%D0%B5%D0%BD%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%B2,_%D0%93%D0%B5%D0%BE%D1%80%D0%B3%D0%B8%D0%B9_%D0%9C%D0%B0%D0%BA%D1%81%D0%B8%D0%BC%D0%B8%D0%BB%D0%B8%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B8%D1%87" title="Маленков, Георгий Максимилианович">Г.&#160;М.&#160;Маленков</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/%D0%91%D0%B5%D1%80%D0%B8%D1%8F,_%D0%9B%D0%B0%D0%B2%D1%80%D0%B5%D0%BD%D1%82%D0%B8%D0%B9_%D0%9F%D0%B0%D0%B2%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B8%D1%87" title="Берия, Лаврентий Павлович">Л.&#160;П.&#160;Берия</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/%D0%91%D1%83%D0%BB%D0%B3%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%B8%D0%BD,_%D0%9D%D0%B8%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%BB%D0%B0%D0%B9_%D0%90%D0%BB%D0%B5%D0%BA%D1%81%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%B4%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B8%D1%87" title="Булганин, Николай Александрович">Н.&#160;А.&#160;Булганин</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/%D0%A5%D1%80%D1%83%D1%89%D1%91%D0%B2,_%D0%9D%D0%B8%D0%BA%D0%B8%D1%82%D0%B0_%D0%A1%D0%B5%D1%80%D0%B3%D0%B5%D0%B5%D0%B2%D0%B8%D1%87" title="Хрущёв, Никита Сергеевич">Н.&#160;С.&#160;Хрущёв</a></li></ul>
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/%D0%92%D0%BE%D1%80%D0%BE%D1%88%D0%B8%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%B2,_%D0%9A%D0%BB%D0%B8%D0%BC%D0%B5%D0%BD%D1%82_%D0%95%D1%84%D1%80%D0%B5%D0%BC%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B8%D1%87" title="Ворошилов, Климент Ефремович">К.&#160;Е.&#160;Ворошилов</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/%D0%9C%D0%BE%D0%BB%D0%BE%D1%82%D0%BE%D0%B2,_%D0%92%D1%8F%D1%87%D0%B5%D1%81%D0%BB%D0%B0%D0%B2_%D0%9C%D0%B8%D1%85%D0%B0%D0%B9%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B8%D1%87" title="Молотов, Вячеслав Михайлович">В.&#160;М.&#160;Молотов</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/%D0%9A%D0%BE%D1%80%D0%BE%D1%82%D1%87%D0%B5%D0%BD%D0%BA%D0%BE,_%D0%94%D0%B5%D0%BC%D1%8C%D1%8F%D0%BD_%D0%A1%D0%B5%D1%80%D0%B3%D0%B5%D0%B5%D0%B2%D0%B8%D1%87" title="Коротченко, Демьян Сергеевич">Д.&#160;С.&#160;Коротченко</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/%D0%A8%D0%B0%D1%8F%D1%85%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%82%D0%BE%D0%B2,_%D0%96%D1%83%D0%BC%D0%B0%D0%B1%D0%B0%D0%B9_%D0%A8%D0%B0%D1%8F%D1%85%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%82%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B8%D1%87" title="Шаяхметов, Жумабай Шаяхметович">Ж.&#160;Ш.&#160;Шаяхметов</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/%D0%9A%D1%83%D1%83%D1%81%D0%B8%D0%BD%D0%B5%D0%BD,_%D0%9E%D1%82%D1%82%D0%BE_%D0%92%D0%B8%D0%BB%D1%8C%D0%B3%D0%B5%D0%BB%D1%8C%D0%BC%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B8%D1%87" title="Куусинен, Отто Вильгельмович">О.&#160;В.&#160;Куусинен</a></li></ul>
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/%D0%9F%D0%B0%D1%82%D0%BE%D0%BB%D0%B8%D1%87%D0%B5%D0%B2,_%D0%9D%D0%B8%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%BB%D0%B0%D0%B9_%D0%A1%D0%B5%D0%BC%D1%91%D0%BD%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B8%D1%87" title="Патоличев, Николай Семёнович">Н.&#160;С.&#160;Патоличев</a></li>

<li><a href="/wiki/%D0%9D%D0%B8%D1%8F%D0%B7%D0%BE%D0%B2,_%D0%90%D0%BC%D0%B8%D0%BD_%D0%98%D1%80%D0%BC%D0%B0%D1%82%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B8%D1%87" title="Ниязов, Амин Ирматович">А.&#160;И.&#160;Ниязов</a></li>

</div></td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div role="navigation" class="navbox" aria-labelledby="Маршалы_Советского_Союза" data-name="Маршалы Советского Союза"><table class="nowraplinks collapsible autocollapse navbox-inner" style="border-spacing:0;background:transparent;color:inherit"><tbody><tr><th scope="colgroup" class="navbox-title" colspan="4"><span class="navbox-gear" style="float:left;text-align:left;width:5em;margin-right:0.5em"><span class="noprint" typeof="mw:File"><a href="/wiki/%D0%A8%D0%B0%D0%B1%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%BD:%D0%9C%D0%B0%D1%80%D1%88%D0%B0%D0%BB%D1%8B_%D0%A1%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B5%D1%82%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%B3%D0%BE_%D0%A1%D0%BE%D1%8E%D0%B7%D0%B0" title="Перейти к шаблону «Маршалы Советского Союза»"><img alt="Перейти к шаблону «Маршалы Советского Союза»" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/c/c9/Wikipedia_interwiki_section_gear_icon.svg/14px-Wikipedia_interwiki_section_gear_icon.svg.png" decoding="async" width="14" height="14" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/c/c9/Wikipedia_interwiki_section_gear_icon.svg/21px-Wikipedia_interwiki_section_gear_icon.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/c/c9/Wikipedia_interwiki_section_gear_icon.svg/28px-Wikipedia_interwiki_section_gear_icon.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="14" data-file-height="14" /></a></span>&#160;</span><div id="Маршалы_Советского_Союза" style="font-size:114%;margin:0 5em"><a href="/wiki/%D0%9C%D0%B0%D1%80%D1%88%D0%B0%D0%BB_%D0%A1%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B5%D1%82%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%B3%D0%BE_%D0%A1%D0%BE%D1%8E%D0%B7%D0%B0" title="Маршал Советского Союза">Маршалы Советского <sup>3</sup> <i>Впоследствии получил звание Генералиссимуса Советского Союза</i>
</p>
</div></div></td><td class="navbox-image" rowspan="1" style="width:1px;padding:0px 0px 0px 7px"><div><span typeof="mw:File"><a href="/wiki/%D0%A4%D0%B0%D0%B9%D0%BB:Rank_insignia_of_%D0%BC%D0%B0%D1%80%D1%88%D0%B0%D0%BB_%D0%A1%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B5%D1%82%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%B3%D0%BE_%D0%A1%D0%BE%D1%8E%D0%B7%D0%B0.svg" class="mw-file-description" title="Погон Маршала (1955—1991)"><img alt="Погон Маршала (1955—1991)" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/5/5a/Rank_insignia_of_%D0%BC%D0%B0%D1%80%D1%88%D0%B0%D0%BB_%D0%A1%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B5%D1%82%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%B3%D0%BE_%D0%A1%D0%BE%D1%8E%D0%B7%D0%B0.svg/30px-Rank_insignia_of_%D0%BC%D0%B0%D1%80%D1%88%D0%B0%D0%BB_%D0%A1%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B5%D1%82%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%B3%D0%BE_%D0%A1%D0%BE%D1%8E%D0%B7%D0%B0.svg.png" decoding="async" width="30" height="77" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/5/5a/Rank_insignia_of_%D0%BC%D0%B0%D1%80%D1%88%D0%B0%D0%BB_%D0%A1%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B5%D1%82%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%B3%D0%BE_%D0%A1%D0%BE%D1%8E%D0%B7%D0%B0.svg/45px-Rank_insignia_of_%D0%BC%D0%B0%D1%80%D1%88%D0%B0%D0%BB_%D0%A1%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B5%D1%82%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%B3%D0%BE_%D0%A1%D0%BE%D1%8E%D0%B7%D0%B0.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/5/5a/Rank_insignia_of_%D0%BC%D0%B0%D1%80%D1%88%D0%B0%D0%BB_%D0%A1%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B5%D1%82%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%B3%D0%BE_%D0%A1%D0%BE%D1%8E%D0%B7%D0%B0.svg/60px-Rank_insignia_of_%D0%BC%D0%B0%D1%80%D1%88%D0%B0%D0%BB_%D0%A1%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B5%D1%82%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%B3%D0%BE_%D0%A1%D0%BE%D1%8E%D0%B7%D0%B0.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="138" data-file-height="356" /></a></span></div></td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div role="navigation" class="navbox" aria-labelledby="Кавалеры_ордена_«Победа»" data-name="Кавалеры ордена «Победа»"><table class="nowraplinks collapsible collapsed navbox-inner" style="border-spacing:0;background:transparent;color:inherit"><tbody><tr><th scope="colgroup" class="navbox-title" colspan="3"><span class="navbox-gear" style="float:left;text-align:left;width:5em;margin-right:0.5em"><span class="noprint" typeof="mw:File"><a href="/wiki/%D0%A8%D0%B0%D0%B1%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%BD:%D0%9A%D0%B0%D0%B2%D0%B0%D0%BB%D0%B5%D1%80%D1%8B_%D0%BE%D1%80%D0%B4%D0%B5%D0%BD%D0%B0_%C2%AB%D0%9F%D0%BE%D0%B1%D0%B5%D0%B4%D0%B0%C2%BB" title="Перейти к шаблону «Кавалеры ордена «Победа»»"><img alt="Перейти к шаблону «Кавалеры ордена «Победа»»" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/c/c9/Wikipedia_interwiki_section_gear_icon.svg/14px-Wikipedia_interwiki_section_gear_icon.svg.png" decoding="async" width="14" height="14" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/c/c9/Wikipedia_interwiki_section_gear_icon.svg/21px-Wikipedia_interwiki_section_gear_icon.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/c/c9/Wikipedia_interwiki_section_gear_icon.svg/28px-Wikipedia_interwiki_section_gear_icon.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="14" data-file-height="14" /></a></span>&#160;</span><div id="Кавалеры_ордена_«Победа»" style="font-size:114%;margin:0 5em">Кавалеры <a href="/wiki/%D0%9E%D1%80%D0%B4%D0%B5%D0%BD_%C2%AB%D0%9F%D0%BE%D0%B1%D0%B5%D0%B4%D0%B0%C2%BB" title="Орден «Победа»">ордена «Победа»</a></div></th></tr><tr><th scope="row" class="navbox-group" style="width:1px">Двукратные</th><td class="navbox-list navbox-odd hlist" style="text-align:left;border-left-width:2px;border-left-style:solid;width:100%;padding:0px"><div style="padding:0em 0.25em">

Смирнов</a></div></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" class="navbox-group" style="width:1px"><small> Комитет по военным и морским делам РСФСР</small></th><td class="navbox-list navbox-odd hlist" style="text-align:left;border-left-width:2px;border-left-style:solid;width:100%;padding:0px"><div style="padding:0em 0.25em">

<li><a href="/wiki/%D0%94%D0%BE%D0%B3%D1%83%D0%B6%D0%B8%D0%B5%D0%B2,_%D0%92%D0%B8%D1%82%D0%B0%D0%BB%D0%B8%D0%B9_%D0%A5%D1%83%D1%81%D1%81%D0%B5%D0%B9%D0%BD%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B8%D1%87" title="Догужиев, Виталий Хуссейнович">Догужиев</a> (<abbr title="исполняющий обязанности" class="nowrap">и.&#8201;о.</abbr>)</li>

</div></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" class="navbox-group" style="width:1px"><a href="/wiki/%D0%9F%D1%80%D0%B5%D0%B4%D1%81%D0%B5%D0%B4%D0%B0%D1%82%D0%B5%D0%BB%D1%8C_%D0%9F%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B2%D0%B8%D1%82%D0%B5%D0%BB%D1%8C%D1%81%D1%82%D0%B2%D0%B0_%D0%A0%D0%BE%D1%81%D1%81%D0%B8%D0%B9%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%B9_%D0%A4%D0%B5%D0%B4%D0%B5%D1%80%D0%B0%D1%86%D0%B8%D0%B8" title="Председатель Правительства Российской Федерации">Российская Федерация</a></th><td class="navbox-list navbox-odd hlist" style="text-align:left;border-left-width:2px;border-left-style:solid;width:100%;padding:0px"><div style="padding:0em 0.25em">
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/%D0%95%D0%BB%D1%8C%D1%86%D0%B8%D0%BD,_%D0%91%D0%BE%D1%80%D0%B8%D1%81_%D0%9D%D0%B8%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%BB%D0%B0%D0%B5%D0%B2%D0%B8%D1%87" title="Ельцин, Борис Николаевич">Ельцин</a>¹</li>

<li><a href="/wiki/%D0%A7%D0%B5%D1%80%D0%BD%D0%BE%D0%BC%D1%8B%D1%80%D0%B4%D0%B8%D0%BD,_%D0%92%D0%B8%D0%BA%D1%82%D0%BE%D1%80_%D0%A1%D1%82%D0%B5%D0%BF%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B8%D1%87" title="Черномырдин, Виктор Степанович">Черномырдин</a></li>

<ul><li><a class="mw-selflink selflink">Иосиф Виссарионович Сталин</a> (1945)</li></ul>
</div></td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div role="navigation" class="navbox" aria-labelledby="Человек_года_по_версии_журнала_«Тайм»" data-name="Человек года (по версии журнала Тайм) 1927—1950"><table class="nowraplinks collapsible autocollapse navbox-inner" style="border-spacing:0;background:transparent;color:inherit"><tbody><tr><th scope="colgroup" class="navbox-title" colspan="2"><span class="navbox-gear" style="float:left;text-align:left;width:5em;margin-right:0.5em"><span class="noprint" typeof="mw:File"><a href="/wiki/%D0%A8%D0%B0%D0%B1%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%BD:%D0%A7%D0%B5%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B5%D0%BA_%D0%B3%D0%BE%D0%B4%D0%B0_(%D0%BF%D0%BE_%D0%B2%D0%B5%D1%80%D1%81%D0%B8%D0%B8_%D0%B6%D1%83%D1%80%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%BB%D0%B0_%D0%A2%D0%B0%D0%B9%D0%BC)_1927%E2%80%941950" title="Перейти к шаблону «Человек года (по версии журнала Тайм) 1927—1950»"><img alt="Перейти к шаблону «Человек года (по версии журнала Тайм) 1927—1950»" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/c/c9/Wikipedia_interwiki_section_gear_icon.svg/14px-Wikipedia_interwiki_section_gear_icon.svg.png" decoding="async" width="14" height="14" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/c/c9/Wikipedia_interwiki_section_gear_icon.svg/21px-Wikipedia_interwiki_section_gear_icon.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/c/c9/Wikipedia_interwiki_section_gear_icon.svg/28px-Wikipedia_interwiki_section_gear_icon.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="14" data-file-height="14" /></a></span>&#160;</span><div id="Человек_года_по_версии_журнала_«Тайм»" style="font-size:114%;margin:0 5em"><a href="/wiki/%D0%A7%D0%B5%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B5%D0%BA_%D0%B3%D0%BE%D0%B4%D0%B0_(Time)" title="Человек года (Time)">Человек года по версии журнала «Тайм»</a></div></th></tr><tr><td class="navbox-list navbox-odd hlist" style="width:100%;padding:0px"><div style="padding:0em 0.25em"><div class="NavContent">

<li><a href="/wiki/%D0%9A%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B9%D1%81%D0%BB%D0%B5%D1%80,_%D0%A3%D0%BE%D0%BB%D1%82%D0%B5%D1%80_%D0%9F%D0%B5%D1%80%D1%81%D0%B8" title="Крайслер, Уолтер Перси">Уолтер Крайслер</a> (1928)</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/%D0%AE%D0%BD%D0%B3,_%D0%9E%D1%83%D1%8D%D0%BD" title="Юнг, Оуэн">Оуэн Юнг</a> (1929)</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/%D0%9C%D0%B0%D1%85%D0%B0%D1%82%D0%BC%D0%B0_%D0%93%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%B4%D0%B8" title="Махатма Ганди">Махатма Ганди</a> (1930)</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/%D0%9B%D0%B0%D0%B2%D0%B0%D0%BB%D1%8C,_%D0%9F%D1%8C%D0%B5%D1%80" title="Лаваль, Пьер">Пьер Лаваль</a> (1931)</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/%D0%A0%D1%83%D0%B7%D0%B2%D0%B5%D0%BB%D1%8C%D1%82,_%D0%A4%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%BA%D0%BB%D0%B8%D0%BD_%D0%94%D0%B5%D0%BB%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%BE" title="Рузвельт, Франклин Делано">Франклин Рузвельт</a> (1932)</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/%D0%94%D0%B6%D0%BE%D0%BD%D1%81%D0%BE%D0%BD,_%D0%A5%D1%8C%D1%8E" title="Джонсон, Хью">Хью Джонсон</a> (1933)</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/%D0%A0%D1%83%D0%B7%D0%B2%D0%B5%D0%BB%D1%8C%D1%82,_%D0%A4%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%BA%D0%BB%D0%B8%D0%BD_%D0%94%D0%B5%D0%BB%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%BE" title="Рузвельт, Франклин Делано">Франклин Рузвельт</a> (1934)</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/%D0%A5%D0%B0%D0%B9%D0%BB%D0%B5_%D0%A1%D0%B5%D0%BB%D0%B0%D1%81%D1%81%D0%B8%D0%B5" title="Хайле Селассие">Хайле Селассие I</a> (1935)</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/%D0%A1%D0%B8%D0%BC%D0%BF%D1%81%D0%BE%D0%BD,_%D0%A3%D0%BE%D0%BB%D0%BB%D0%B8%D1%81" title="Симпсон, Уоллис">Уоллис Симпсон</a> (1936)</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/%D0%A7%D0%B0%D0%BD_%D0%9A%D0%B0%D0%B9%D1%88%D0%B8" title="Чан Кайши">Чан Кайши</a> + <a href="/wiki/%D0%A1%D1%83%D0%BD_%D0%9C%D1%8D%D0%B9%D0%BB%D0%B8%D0%BD" title="Сун Мэйлин">Сун Мэйлин</a> (1937)</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/%D0%93%D0%B8%D1%82%D0%BB%D0%B5%D1%80,_%D0%90%D0%B4%D0%BE%D0%BB%D1%8C%D1%84" title="Гитлер, Адольф">Адольф Гитлер</a> (1938)</li>
<li><a class="mw-selflink selflink">Иосиф Сталин</a> (1939)</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/%D0%A7%D0%B5%D1%80%D1%87%D0%B8%D0%BB%D0%BB%D1%8C,_%D0%A3%D0%B8%D0%BD%D1%81%D1%82%D0%BE%D0%BD" title="Черчилль, Уинстон">Уинстон Черчилль</a> (1940)</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/%D0%A0%D1%83%D0%B7%D0%B2%D0%B5%D0%BB%D1%8C%D1%82,_%D0%A4%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%BA%D0%BB%D0%B8%D0%BD_%D0%94%D0%B5%D0%BB%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%BE" title="Рузвельт, Франклин Делано">Франклин Рузвельт</a> (1941)</li>
<li><a class="mw-selflink selflink">Иосиф Сталин</a> (1942)</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/%D0%9C%D0%B0%D1%80%D1%88%D0%B0%D0%BB%D0%BB,_%D0%94%D0%B6%D0%BE%D1%80%D0%B4%D0%B6" title="Маршалл, Джордж">Джордж Маршалл</a> (1943)</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/%D0%AD%D0%B9%D0%B7%D0%B5%D0%BD%D1%85%D0%B0%D1%83%D1%8D%D1%80,_%D0%94%D1%83%D0%B0%D0%B9%D1%82_%D0%94%D1%8D%D0%B2%D0%B8%D0%B4" title="Эйзенхауэр, Дуайт Дэвид">Дуайт Эйзенхауэр</a> (1944)</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/%D0%A2%D1%80%D1%83%D0%BC%D1%8D%D0%BD,_%D0%93%D0%B0%D1%80%D1%80%D0%B8" title="Трумэн, Гарри">Гарри Трумэн</a> (1945)</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/%D0%91%D0%B8%D1%80%D0%BD%D1%81,_%D0%94%D0%B6%D0%B5%D0%B9%D0%BC%D1%81_%D0%A4%D1%80%D1%8D%D0%BD%D1%81%D0%B8%D1%81" title="Бирнс, Джеймс Фрэнсис">Джеймс Бирнс</a> (1946)</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/%D0%9C%D0%B0%D1%80%D1%88%D0%B0%D0%BB%D0%BB,_%D0%94%D0%B6%D0%BE%D1%80%D0%B4%D0%B6" title="Маршалл, Джордж">Джордж Маршалл</a> (1947)</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/%D0%A2%D1%80%D1%83%D0%BC%D1%8D%D0%BD,_%D0%93%D0%B0%D1%80%D1%80%D0%B8" title="Трумэн, Гарри">Гарри Трумэн</a> (1948)</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/%D0%A7%D0%B5%D1%80%D1%87%D0%B8%D0%BB%D0%BB%D1%8C,_%D0%A3%D0%B8%D0%BD%D1%81%D1%82%D0%BE%D0%BD" title="Черчилль, Уинстон">Уинстон Черчилль</a> (1949)</li>
<li><i><a href="/wiki/%D0%92%D0%BE%D0%BE%D1%80%D1%83%D0%B6%D1%91%D0%BD%D0%BD%D1%8B%D0%B5_%D1%81%D0%B8%D0%BB%D1%8B_%D0%A1%D0%A8%D0%90" title="Вооружённые силы США">Американский солдат</a></i> (1950)</li></ul>

<div role="navigation" class="navbox" aria-labelledby="Марксизм" data-name="Марксизм"><table class="nowraplinks collapsible collapsed navbox-inner" style="border-spacing:0;background:transparent;color:inherit"><tbody><tr><th scope="colgroup" class="navbox-title" colspan="2"><span class="navbox-gear" style="float:left;text-align:left;width:5em;margin-right:0.5em"><span class="noprint" typeof="mw:File"><a href="/wiki/%D0%A8%D0%B0%D0%B1%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%BD:%D0%9C%D0%B0%D1%80%D0%BA%D1%81%D0%B8%D0%B7%D0%BC" title="Перейти к шаблону «Марксизм»"><img alt="Перейти к шаблону «Марксизм»" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/c/c9/Wikipedia_interwiki_section_gear_icon.svg/14px-Wikipedia_interwiki_section_gear_icon.svg.png" decoding="async" width="14" height="14" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/c/c9/Wikipedia_interwiki_section_gear_icon.svg/21px-Wikipedia_interwiki_section_gear_icon.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/c/c9/Wikipedia_interwiki_section_gear_icon.svg/28px-Wikipedia_interwiki_section_gear_icon.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="14" data-file-height="14" /></a></span>&#160;</span><div id="Марксизм" style="font-size:114%;margin:0 5em"><a href="/wiki/%D0%9C%D0%B0%D1%80%D0%BA%D1%81%D0%B8%D0%B7%D0%BC" title="Марксизм">Марксизм</a></div></th></tr><tr><th scope="row" class="navbox-group" style="width:1px"><span data-interwiki-lang="en" data-interwiki-article="Marxist philosophy"><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%A4%D0%B8%D0%BB%D0%BE%D1%81%D0%BE%D1%84%D0%B8%D1%8F_%D0%BC%D0%B0%D1%80%D0%BA%D1%81%D0%B8%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B0&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Философия марксизма (страница отсутствует)">Философия</a></span><span class="noprint" style="font-style:normal; <ul><li><a href="/wiki/%D0%98%D1%81%D1%82%D0%BE%D1%80%D0%B8%D1%87%D0%B5%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%B8%D0%B9_%D0%BC%D0%B0%D1%82%D0%B5%D1%80%D0%B8%D0%B0%D0%BB%D0%B8%D0%B7%D0%BC" title="Исторический материализм">Исторический материализм</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/%D0%94%D0%B8%D0%B0%D0%BB%D0%B5%D0%BA%D1%82%D0%B8%D1%87%D0%B5%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%B8%D0%B9_%D0%BC%D0%B0%D1%82%D0%B5%D1%80%D0%B8%D0%B0%D0%BB%D0%B8%D0%B7%D0%BC" title="Диалектический материализм">Диалектический материализм</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/%D0%9C%D0%B0%D1%82%D0%B5%D1%80%D0%B8%D0%B0%D0%BB%D0%B8%D1%81%D1%82%D0%B8%D1%87%D0%B5%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%B0%D1%8F_%D0%B4%D0%B8%D0%B0%D0%BB%D0%B5%D0%BA%D1%82%D0%B8%D0%BA%D0%B0" title="Материалистическая диалектика">Материалистическая диалектика</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/%D0%94%D0%B8%D0%B0%D0%BB%D0%B5%D0%BA%D1%82%D0%B8%D1%87%D0%B5%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%B0%D1%8F_%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%B3%D0%B8%D0%BA%D0%B0" title="Диалектическая логика">Диалектическая логика</a></li></ul>
</div></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" class="navbox-group" style="width:1px"><span data-interwiki-lang="en" data-interwiki-article="Marxist sociology"><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%9C%D0%B0%D1%80%D0%BA%D1%81%D0%B8%D1%81%D1%82%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%B0%D1%8F_%D1%81%D0%BE%D1%86%D0%B8%D0%BE%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%B3%D0%B8%D1%8F&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Марксистская социология (страница отсутствует)">Социология</a></span><span class="noprint" style="font-style:normal; font-weight:normal;"><sup><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Marxist_sociology" class="extiw" title="en:Marxist sociology"><span title="Marxist sociology — версия статьи «Марксистская социология» на английском языке">[en]</span></a></sup></span></th><td class="navbox-list navbox-even hlist" style="text-align:left;border-left-width:2px;border-left-style:solid;width:100%;padding:0px"><div style="padding:0em 0.25em">
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/%D0%9E%D1%82%D1%87%D1%83%D0%B6%D0%B4%D0%B5%D0%BD%D0%B8%D0%B5_(%D0%9C%D0%B0%D1%80%D0%BA%D1%81)" title="Отчуждение (Маркс)">Теория отчуждения</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/%D0%A1%D0%BE%D1%86%D0%B8%D0%B0%D0%BB%D1%8C%D0%BD%D1%8B%D0%B9_%D0%BA%D0%BB%D0%B0%D1%81%D1%81#Социальные_классы_в_марксизме" title="Социальный класс">Классовая теория</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/%D0%91%D1%83%D1%80%D0%B6%D1%83%D0%B0%D0%B7%D0%B8%D1%8F" title="Буржуазия">Буржуазия</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/%D0%9F%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%BB%D0%B5%D1%82%D0%B0%D1%80%D0%B8%D0%B0%D1%82" title="Пролетариат">Пролетариат</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/%D0%A0%D0%B5%D0%B2%D0%BE%D0%BB%D1%8E%D1%86%D0%B8%D1%8F" title="Революция">Революция</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/%D0%9D%D0%B0%D1%83%D1%87%D0%BD%D1%8B%D0%B9_%D1%81%D0%BE%D1%86%D0%B8%D0%B0%D0%BB%D0%B8%D0%B7%D0%BC" title="Научный социализм">Научный социализм</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/%D0%9A%D0%BE%D0%BC%D0%BC%D1%83%D0%BD%D0%B8%D0%B7%D0%BC" title="Коммунизм">Коммунизм</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/%D0%A0%D0%B0%D0%B1%D0%BE%D1%87%D0%B0%D1%8F_%D0%B0%D1%80%D0%B8%D1%81%D1%82%D0%BE%D0%BA%D1%80%D0%B0%D1%82%D0%B8%D1%8F" title="Рабочая аристократия">Рабочая аристократия</a></li>

	<h3 >Поиск</h3>
	<form action="/w/index.php" id="searchform" class="vector-search-box-form">
		<div id="simpleSearch"
			class="vector-search-box-inner"
			 data-search-loc="header-navigation">

				 type="search" name="search" placeholder="Искать в Википедии" aria-label="Искать в Википедии" autocapitalize="sentences" title="Искать в Википедии [f]" accesskey="f" id="searchInput"
			>
			<input type="hidden" name="title" value="Служебная:Поиск">
			<input id="mw-searchButton"
				 class="searchButton mw-fallbackSearchButton" type="submit" name="fulltext" title="Найти страницы, содержащие указанный текст" value="Найти">

				 class="searchButton" type="submit" name="go" title="Перейти к странице, имеющей в точности такое название" value="Перейти">

	<h3
		id="p-navigation-label"
		
		class="vector-menu-heading "
	>
		<span class="vector-menu-heading-label">Навигация</span>
	</h3>
	<div class="vector-menu-content">
		
		<ul class="vector-menu-content-list">
			
			<li id="n-mainpage-description" class="mw-list-item"><a href="/wiki/%D0%97%D0%B0%D0%B3%D0%BB%D0%B0%D0%B2%D0%BD%D0%B0%D1%8F_%D1%81%D1%82%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%B8%D1%86%D0%B0" title="Перейти на заглавную страницу [z]" accesskey="z"><span>Заглавная страница</span></a></li><li id="n-content" class="mw-list-item"><a href="/wiki/%D0%92%D0%B8%D0%BA%D0%B8%D0%BF%D0%B5%D0%B4%D0%B8%D1%8F:%D0%A1%D0%BE%D0%B4%D0%B5%D1%80%D0%B6%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%B8%D0%B5"><span>Содержание</span></a></li><li id="n-featured" class="mw-list-item"><a href="/wiki/%D0%92%D0%B8%D0%BA%D0%B8%D0%BF%D0%B5%D0%B4%D0%B8%D1%8F:%D0%98%D0%B7%D0%B1%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%BD%D1%8B%D0%B5_%D1%81%D1%82%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8C%D0%B8" title="Статьи, считающиеся лучшими статьями проекта"><span>Избранные статьи</span></a></li><li id="n-randompage" class="mw-list-item"><a href="/wiki/%D0%A1%D0%BB%D1%83%D0%B6%D0%B5%D0%B1%D0%BD%D0%B0%D1%8F:%D0%A1%D0%BB%D1%83%D1%87%D0%B0%D0%B9%D0%BD%D0%B0%D1%8F_%D1%81%D1%82%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%B8%D1%86%D0%B0" title="Посмотреть случайно выбранную страницу [x]" accesskey="x"><span>Случайная статья</span></a></li><li id="n-currentevents" class="mw-list-item"><a href="/wiki/%D0%9F%D0%BE%D1%80%D1%82%D0%B0%D0%BB:%D0%A2%D0%B5%D0%BA%D1%83%D1%89%D0%B8%D0%B5_%D1%81%D0%BE%D0%B1%D1%8B%D1%82%D0%B8%D1%8F" title="Статьи о текущих событиях в мире"><span>Текущие события</span></a></li><li id="n-sitesupport" class="mw-list-item"><a href="//donate.wikimedia.org/wiki/Special:FundraiserRedirector?utm_source=donate&amp;utm_medium=sidebar&amp;utm_campaign=C13_ru.wikipedia.org&amp;uselang=ru" title="Поддержите нас"><span>Пожертвовать</span></a></li>
		</ul>
		
	</div>
</nav>

<script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https:\/\/schema.org","@type":"Article","name":"\u0421\u0442\u0430\u043b\u0438\u043d, \u0418\u043e\u0441\u0438\u0444 \u0412\u0438\u0441\u0441\u0430\u0440\u0438\u043e\u043d\u043e\u0432\u0438\u0447","url":"https:\/\/ru.wikipedia.org\/wiki\/%D0%A1%D1%82%D0%B0%D0%BB%D0%B8%D0%BD,_%D0%98%D0%BE%D1%81%D0%B8%D1%84_%D0%92%D0%B8%D1%81%D1%81%D0%B0%D1%80%D0%B8%D0%BE%D0%BD%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B8%D1%87","sameAs":"http:\/\/www.wikidata.org\/entity\/Q855","mainEntity":"http:\/\/www.wikidata.org\/entity\/Q855","author":{"@type":"Organization","name":"Contributors to Wikimedia projects"},"publisher":{"@type":"Organization","name":"\u0424\u043e\u043d\u0434 \u0412\u0438\u043a\u0438\u043c\u0435\u0434\u0438\u0430","logo":{"@type":"ImageObject","url":"https:\/\/www.wikimedia.org\/static\/images\/wmf-hor-googpub.png"}},"datePublished":"2004-02-10T10:12:37Z","image":"https:\/\/upload.wikimedia.org\/wikipedia\/commons\/9\/9b\/CroppedStalin1943.jpg","headline":"\u0440\u043e\u0441\u0441\u0438\u0439\u0441\u043a\u0438\u0439 \u0440\u0435\u0432\u043e\u043b\u044e\u0446\u0438\u043e\u043d\u0435\u0440, \u0441\u043e\u0432\u0435\u0442\u0441\u043a\u0438\u0439 \u0433\u043e\u0441\u0443\u0434\u0430\u0440\u0441\u0442\u0432\u0435\u043d\u043d\u044b\u0439, \u0432\u043e\u0435\u043d\u043d\u044b\u0439 \u0438 \u043f\u0430\u0440\u0442\u0438\u0439\u043d\u044b\u0439 \u0434\u0435\u044f\u0442\u0435\u043b\u044c"}</script>

In [14]:
from urllib.request import urlopen
from bs4 import BeautifulSoup


def main():
    try:
        html = urlopen('https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/Сталин,_Иосиф_Виссарионович')
    except Exception as e:
        print(type(e), e)


main()

<class 'UnicodeEncodeError'> 'ascii' codec can't encode characters in position 10-15: ordinal not in range(128)

ChatGPT:
The error you are encountering is due to the attempt to encode non-ASCII characters in the URL. The problem is that the URL you are trying to access contains non-ASCII characters such as Cyrillic characters (for the Russian language), and it's causing the urlopen function to fail due to encoding issues.

To resolve this issue, you can encode the URL using the quote function from the urllib.parse module, which will properly handle any non-ASCII characters in the URL.

By using the quote function to encode the URL before passing it to urlopen, you can avoid the UnicodeEncodeError related to non-ASCII characters in the URL.

Then, you can use the urllib.parse module to decode the URL.

In [10]:
from urllib.parse import quote, unquote
from urllib.request import urlopen
from bs4 import BeautifulSoup

n = 20

def main():
    url = 'https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/Сталин,_Иосиф_Виссарионович'
    encoded_url = quote(url, safe=':/')
    html = urlopen(encoded_url)
    bs = BeautifulSoup(html, 'lxml')

    a_tags = bs.find_all('a')

#     for link in links:
#         print(link)

    count = 0
    for tag in a_tags:
        if 'href' in tag.attrs:
            decoded_url = unquote(tag.attrs['href'])
            print(decoded_url)
            count += 1
        if count == n:
            break


main()

In [19]:
help(quote)

Help on function quote in module urllib.parse:

quote(string, safe='/', encoding=None, errors=None)
    quote('abc def') -> 'abc%20def'

    Each part of a URL, e.g. the path info, the query, etc., has a
    different set of reserved characters that must be quoted. The
    quote function offers a cautious (not minimal) way to quote a
    string for most of these parts.

    RFC 3986 Uniform Resource Identifier (URI): Generic Syntax lists
    the following (un)reserved characters.

    unreserved    = ALPHA / DIGIT / "-" / "." / "_" / "~"
    reserved      = gen-delims / sub-delims
    gen-delims    = ":" / "/" / "?" / "#" / "[" / "]" / "@"
    sub-delims    = "!" / "$" / "&" / "'" / "(" / ")"
                  / "*" / "+" / "," / ";" / "="

    Each of the reserved characters is reserved in some component of a URL,
    but not necessarily in all of them.

    The quote function %-escapes all characters that are neither in the
    unreserved chars ("always safe") nor the additional chars set via the
    safe arg.

    The default for the safe arg is '/'. The character is reserved, but in
    typical usage the quote function is being called on a path where the
    existing slash characters are to be preserved.

    Python 3.7 updates from using RFC 2396 to RFC 3986 to quote URL strings.
    Now, "~" is included in the set of unreserved characters.

    string and safe may be either str or bytes objects. encoding and errors
    must not be specified if string is a bytes object.

    The optional encoding and errors parameters specify how to deal with
    non-ASCII characters, as accepted by the str.encode method.
    By default, encoding='utf-8' (characters are encoded with UTF-8), and
    errors='strict' (unsupported characters raise a UnicodeEncodeError).
In [20]:
help(unquote)

Help on function unquote in module urllib.parse:

unquote(string, encoding='utf-8', errors='replace')
    Replace %xx escapes by their single-character equivalent. The optional
    encoding and errors parameters specify how to decode percent-encoded
    sequences into Unicode characters, as accepted by the bytes.decode()
    method.
    By default, percent-encoded sequences are decoded with UTF-8, and invalid
    sequences are replaced by a placeholder character.

    unquote('abc%20def') -> 'abc def'.

Filter links¶

If you look at the list of links produced, you’ll notice that all the articles you’d expect are there: /wiki/Pravda, /wiki/Central_Committee_of_the_Communist_Party_of_the_Soviet_Union, /wiki/Prague_Conference and so on. However, there are some things that you don’t want as well: //wikimediafoundation.org/wiki/Privacy_policy, //en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wikipedia:Contact_us.

In fact, Wikipedia is full of sidebar, footer, and header links that appear on every page, along with links to the category pages, talk pages, and other pages that do not contain different articles:

  • /wiki/Help:Introduction
  • /wiki/Wikipedia:Community_portal

If you examine the links that point to article pages (as opposed to other internal pages), you’ll see that they all have three things in common:

  • They reside within the div with the id set to bodyContent.
  • The URLs do not contain colons.
  • The URLs begin with /wiki/.

You can use these rules to revise the code slightly to retrieve only the desired article links by using the regular expression ^(/wiki/)((?!:).)*$"):

In [21]:
from urllib.request import urlopen
from bs4 import BeautifulSoup
import re

html = urlopen('https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Joseph_Stalin')
bs = BeautifulSoup(html, 'lxml')

links = bs.find('div', {'id': 'bodyContent'}
               ).find_all('a', href=re.compile("^(/wiki/)((?!:).)*$")
)
In [24]:
n = 20
count = 0
for link in links:
    if 'href' in link.attrs:
        print(link.attrs['href'])
        count += 1
    if count == n:
        break

/wiki/Stalin_(disambiguation)
/wiki/Eastern_Slavic_naming_conventions
/wiki/Patronymic
/wiki/Surname
/wiki/Generalissimus_of_the_Soviet_Union
/wiki/Tehran_Conference
/wiki/General_Secretary_of_the_Communist_Party_of_the_Soviet_Union
/wiki/Vyacheslav_Molotov
/wiki/Nikita_Khrushchev
/wiki/Chairman_of_the_Council_of_Ministers_of_the_Soviet_Union
/wiki/Georgy_Malenkov
/wiki/Minister_of_Defence_(Soviet_Union)
/wiki/Semyon_Timoshenko
/wiki/Nikolai_Bulganin
/wiki/People%27s_Commissariat_for_Nationalities
/wiki/Vladimir_Lenin
/wiki/Old_Style_and_New_Style_dates
/wiki/Gori,_Georgia
/wiki/Tiflis_Governorate
/wiki/Russian_SFSR

Of course, having a script that finds all article links in one, hardcoded Wikipedia article, while interesting, is fairly useless in practice. You need to be able to take this code and transform it into something more like the following:

  • A single function, get_links, that takes in a Wikipedia article URL of the form /wiki/<Article_Name> and returns a list of all linked article URLs in the same form.
  • A main function that calls get_links with a starting article, chooses a random article link from the returned list, and calls get_links again, until you stop the program or until no article links are found on the new page.

Here is the complete code that accomplishes this:

In [2]:
import random
import re
from urllib.request import urlopen

from bs4 import BeautifulSoup

LIMIT = 20


def main():
    links = get_links("/wiki/Joseph_Stalin")

    count = 0
    while len(links) > 0:
        new_article = links[random.randint(0, len(links) - 1)].attrs["href"]
        print(new_article)
        links = get_links(new_article)
        count += 1
        if count == LIMIT:
            break
    return 0


def get_links(url):
    html = urlopen(f"https://en.wikipedia.org{url}")
    bs = BeautifulSoup(html, "lxml")

    return bs.find("div", {"id": "bodyContent"}).find_all(
        "a", href=re.compile("^(/wiki/)((?!:).)*$")
    )


if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

/wiki/Volga-Volga
/wiki/Isaak_Dunayevsky
/wiki/Kharkiv_National_Kotlyarevsky_University_of_Arts
/wiki/National_Aerospace_University_%E2%80%93_Kharkiv_Aviation_Institute
/wiki/Vinnytsia_National_Technical_University
/wiki/Kyiv_National_Economic_University
/wiki/Management
/wiki/Procedure_(business)
/wiki/Standard_Operating_Procedure
/wiki/List_of_signs_and_symptoms_of_diving_disorders
/wiki/Type_7103_DSRV
/wiki/Scuba_gas_planning
/wiki/Constant_weight
/wiki/Dottie_Frazier
/wiki/Polespear
/wiki/GRUMEC
/wiki/HeinrichsWeikamp
/wiki/Underwater_Demolition_Team
/wiki/Dewey_Smith
/wiki/DIN_7876

Russian urls:

In [1]:
import random
import re
import urllib.parse
import urllib.request

from bs4 import BeautifulSoup

LIMIT = 20


def main():
    links = get_links("/wiki/Сталин,_Иосиф_Виссарионович")

    count = 0
    while len(links) > 0:
        new_article = links[random.randint(0, len(links) - 1)].attrs["href"]
        new_article = urllib.parse.unquote(new_article)
        print(new_article)
        links = get_links(new_article)
        count += 1
        if count == LIMIT:
            break
    return 0


def get_links(url):
    url = urllib.parse.quote(url)
    html = urllib.request.urlopen(f"https://ru.wikipedia.org{url}")
    bs = BeautifulSoup(html, "lxml")

    return bs.find("div", {"id": "bodyContent"}).find_all(
        "a", href=re.compile("^(/wiki/)((?!:).)*$")
    )


if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

/wiki/Родионов,_Михаил_Иванович
/wiki/Черноусов,_Борис_Николаевич

Needless code - VR¶

VR:
It seems like this part is needless:

bs.find("div", {"id": "bodyContent"}).

Compare the results for the first link the links array, they are the same:

In [7]:
import random
import re
import urllib.parse
import urllib.request

from bs4 import BeautifulSoup

LIMIT = 20


def main():
    links = get_links("/wiki/Сталин,_Иосиф_Виссарионович")

    count = 0
    while len(links) > 0:
        new_article = links[0].attrs["href"]
        new_article = urllib.parse.unquote(new_article)
        print(new_article)
        links = get_links(new_article)
        count += 1
        if count == LIMIT:
            break
    return 0


def get_links(url):
    url = urllib.parse.quote(url)
    html = urllib.request.urlopen(f"https://ru.wikipedia.org{url}")
    bs = BeautifulSoup(html, "lxml")

    return bs.find("div", {"id": "bodyContent"}).find_all(
        "a", href=re.compile("^(/wiki/)((?!:).)*$")
    )


if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

import random
import re
import urllib.parse
import urllib.request

from bs4 import BeautifulSoup

LIMIT = 20


def main():
    links = get_links("/wiki/Сталин,_Иосиф_Виссарионович")

    count = 0
    while len(links) > 0:
        new_article = links[0].attrs["href"]
        new_article = urllib.parse.unquote(new_article)
        print(new_article)
        links = get_links(new_article)
        count += 1
        if count == LIMIT:
            break
    return 0


def get_links(url):
    url = urllib.parse.quote(url)
    html = urllib.request.urlopen(f"https://ru.wikipedia.org{url}")
    bs = BeautifulSoup(html, "lxml")

    return bs.find_all(
        "a", href=re.compile("^(/wiki/)((?!:).)*$")
    )


if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

3.2 Crawling an Entire Site¶

Crawling an entire site, especially a large one, is a memory-intensive process that is best suited to applications for which a database to store crawling results is readily available. However, you can explore the behavior of these types of applications without running them full-scale. To learn more about running these applications by using a database, see Chapter 6.

Deep web¶

The deep web is any part of the web that’s not part of the surface web. The surface is part of the internet that is indexed by search engines. Estimates vary widely, but the deep web almost certainly makes up about 90% of the internet. Because Google can’t do things like submit forms, find pages that haven’t been linked to by a top-level domain, or investigate sites where robots.txt prohibits it, the surface web stays relatively small.

Avoid crawling the same twice¶

To avoid crawling the same page twice, it is extremely important that all internal links discovered are formatted consistently, and kept in a running set for easy lookups, while the program is running (a relational database with UNIQUE constraint is much better). A set is similar to a list, but elements do not have a specific order, and only unique elements will be stored, which is ideal for our needs. Only links that are “new” should be crawled and searched for additional links:

# I just put it here without check, it must be implemented with the database VR
from urllib.request import urlopen
from bs4 import BeautifulSoup
import re

pages = set()
def getLinks(pageUrl):
    global pages
    html = urlopen('http://en.wikipedia.org{}'.format(pageUrl))
    bs = BeautifulSoup(html, 'html.parser')
    for link in bs.find_all('a', href=re.compile('^(/wiki/)')):
        if 'href' in link.attrs:
            if link.attrs['href'] not in pages:
                #We have encountered a new page
                newPage = link.attrs['href']
                print(newPage)
                pages.add(newPage)
                getLinks(newPage)
getLinks('')

Initially, getLinks is called with an empty URL. This is translated as “the front page of Wikipedia” as soon as the empty URL is prepended with http://en.wikipedia.org inside the function. Then, each link on the first page is iterated through and a check is made to see whether it is in the global set of pages (a set of pages that the script has encountered already). If not, it is added to the list, printed to the screen, and the getLinks function is called recursively on it.

Python has a default recursion limit (the number of times a program can recursively call itself) of 1,000. Because Wikipedia’s network of links is extremely large, this program will eventually hit that recursion limit and stop, unless you put in a recursion counter or something to prevent that from happening.

Collecting Data Across an Entire Site¶

Let’s look at how to build a scraper that collects the title, the first paragraph of content, and the link to edit the page (if available).

As always, the first step to determine how best to do this is to look at a few pages from the site and determine a pattern. By looking at a handful of Wikipedia pages (both articles and nonarticle pages such as the privacy policy page), the following things should be clear:

  • All titles (on all pages, regardless of their status as an article page, an edit history page, or any other page) have titles under h1 → span tags, and these are the only h1 tags on the page. 
  • As mentioned before, all body text lives under the div#bodyContent tag. However, if you want to get more specific and access just the first paragraph of text, you might be better off using div#mw-content-text → p (selecting the first paragraph tag only). This is true for all content pages except file pages (for example, https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/File:Orbit_of_274301_Wikipedia.svg), which do not have sections of content text.
  • Edit links occur only on article pages. If they occur, they will be found in the li#ca-edit tag, under li#ca-edit → span → a.

By modifying our basic crawling code, you can create a combination crawler/data-gathering (or, at least, data-printing) program:

In [20]:
import re
from urllib.request import urlopen

from bs4 import BeautifulSoup

pages = set()


def main():

    try:
        getLinks('')
    except Exception as e:
        print(type(e), e)

    return 0


def getLinks(pageUrl):
    global pages
    html = urlopen('http://en.wikipedia.org{}'.format(pageUrl))
    bs = BeautifulSoup(html, 'html.parser')
    try:
        print(bs.h1.get_text())
        print(bs.find(id ='mw-content-text').find_all('p')[0])
        print(bs.find(id='ca-edit').find('span')
                    .find('a').attrs['href'])
    except AttributeError:
        print('This page is missing something! Continuing.')

    for link in bs.find_all('a', href=re.compile('^(/wiki/)')):
        if 'href' in link.attrs:
            if link.attrs['href'] not in pages:
                #We have encountered a new page
                newPage = link.attrs['href']
                print('-'*20)
                print(newPage)
                pages.add(newPage)
                getLinks(newPage)


if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

Main Page
<p><b><a href="/wiki/W._Somerset_Maugham" title="W. Somerset Maugham">W. Somerset Maugham</a></b> (25 January 1874 – 16 December 1965) was an English writer. He achieved national celebrity as a playwright; by 1908 he had four plays running simultaneously in London's <a href="/wiki/West_End_theatre" title="West End theatre">West End</a>. After 1933 he concentrated on novels and short stories. His popularity provoked adverse reactions from highbrow critics, and many belittled him as merely competent. More recent assessments generally rank <i><a href="/wiki/Of_Human_Bondage" title="Of Human Bondage">Of Human Bondage</a></i> as a masterpiece, and his short stories are held in high critical regard. Maugham's plain prose became known for its lucidity, but his reliance on clichés attracted adverse critical commentary. During <a href="/wiki/World_War_I" title="World War I">World War I</a> Maugham worked for the <a href="/wiki/MI6" title="MI6">British Secret Service</a>, later drawing on his experiences for stories published in the 1920s. He married <a href="/wiki/Syrie_Maugham" title="Syrie Maugham">Syrie Wellcome</a> in 1917, and they had a daughter, <a href="/wiki/Elizabeth_Hope,_Baroness_Glendevon" title="Elizabeth Hope, Baroness Glendevon">Liza</a>. However, his principal partner was <a href="/wiki/Gerald_Haxton" title="Gerald Haxton">Gerald Haxton</a>; after Haxton's death, <a href="/wiki/Alan_Searle" title="Alan Searle">Alan Searle</a> became Maugham's secretary and companion. Maugham gave up writing novels after <a href="/wiki/World_War_II" title="World War II">World War II</a> and died in 1965. (<b><a href="/wiki/W._Somerset_Maugham" title="W. Somerset Maugham">Full article...</a></b>)
</p>
This page is missing something! Continuing.
--------------------
/wiki/Main_Page
Main Page
<p><b><a href="/wiki/W._Somerset_Maugham" title="W. Somerset Maugham">W. Somerset Maugham</a></b> (25 January 1874 – 16 December 1965) was an English writer. He achieved national celebrity as a playwright; by 1908 he had four plays running simultaneously in London's <a href="/wiki/West_End_theatre" title="West End theatre">West End</a>. After 1933 he concentrated on novels and short stories. His popularity provoked adverse reactions from highbrow critics, and many belittled him as merely competent. More recent assessments generally rank <i><a href="/wiki/Of_Human_Bondage" title="Of Human Bondage">Of Human Bondage</a></i> as a masterpiece, and his short stories are held in high critical regard. Maugham's plain prose became known for its lucidity, but his reliance on clichés attracted adverse critical commentary. During <a href="/wiki/World_War_I" title="World War I">World War I</a> Maugham worked for the <a href="/wiki/MI6" title="MI6">British Secret Service</a>, later drawing on his experiences for stories published in the 1920s. He married <a href="/wiki/Syrie_Maugham" title="Syrie Maugham">Syrie Wellcome</a> in 1917, and they had a daughter, <a href="/wiki/Elizabeth_Hope,_Baroness_Glendevon" title="Elizabeth Hope, Baroness Glendevon">Liza</a>. However, his principal partner was <a href="/wiki/Gerald_Haxton" title="Gerald Haxton">Gerald Haxton</a>; after Haxton's death, <a href="/wiki/Alan_Searle" title="Alan Searle">Alan Searle</a> became Maugham's secretary and companion. Maugham gave up writing novels after <a href="/wiki/World_War_II" title="World War II">World War II</a> and died in 1965. (<b><a href="/wiki/W._Somerset_Maugham" title="W. Somerset Maugham">Full article...</a></b>)
</p>
